eu.monnetproject.math.sparse

Class SparseMatrix<N extends Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.monnetproject.math.sparse.SparseMatrix<N>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Matrix<N>, Serializable

    public class SparseMatrix<N extends Number>
extends Object
implements Matrix<N>, Serializable
    Implements a sparse matrix
    Author:
    John McCrae
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • SparseMatrix

        public SparseMatrix(int m,
            int n,
            Vectors.Factory<N> using)
        Create a new sparse matrix
        Parameters:
        m - The number of rows
        n - The number of columns

      • SparseMatrix

        public SparseMatrix(int m,
            int n,
            double defaultValue,
            Vectors.Factory<N> using)

      • SparseMatrix

        public SparseMatrix(int n,
            Vector<N>[] arr,
            Vectors.Factory<N> using)
        Construct a new matrix. The consistency of the vectors will not be checked! The defaultValue of all arrays must be equal and all values in the array must be less than n.
        Parameters:
        n - The maximum value in the arrays
        arr - The rows of the matrix
        using - The factory for building new vectors
